message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. It's worth a significant amount to me, but I'm confident it's worth even more to you. I'm willing to sell it for $1200000.  This is a price that reflects the value of the product while still leaving room for a mutually beneficial deal. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
